h1.span: Enduring Excellence in Learning, Leadership, Innovation, and Service

input.name: ucLeftNav$ctl00$hfParentId

li.a: Indian Hill Exempted Village School District

div.h3: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine extends K-12 closure through remainder of 2019-2020 school year
A message from Superintendent Kirk Koennecke

span.div:
It was the immediate call to action by our administration and faculty, fully supported by our Board of Education, to be proactive in our approach to Coronavirus.
It was the patience of our parents, as we worked to refine our distance learning process.
It was the organization of our operational team to ensure every Brave receives needed services, including food, despite our closure.
It was the understanding of our precious students, who had to face a temporary suspension of academics, arts, and athletics.
It is the continued resilience of our entire Brave family to help each other through the Indian Hill Foundation’s establishment of the Braves Helping Braves fund.
This – all of this – is what makes us uniquely Indian Hill.
It is the very definition of Enduring Excellence in Education, Innovation, Leadership, and Service.
As this situation continues to evolve, you can count on consistent communication updates from our team. You will find the latest information here, on our Coronavirus Information page.
Thank you to our Board of Education, our administration, our faculty, our staff, our support organizations, our community, our parents, and our students. We love you. We are here for you. We are, and we always will be, Braves.
In service to our children,
Kirk Koennecke
Superintendent
Indian Hill School District

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'Ohio Department of Education Coronavirus Information');
a.span: Ohio Department of Education Coronavirus Information

div.strong: • Campus will be and remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

br.strong: • During this time, access to all facilities, including athletic fields, will be restricted for staff, students, parents, and community members.
• Only essential operational staff members will be allowed to access our facilities until further notice.
